ack.p: The authors are grateful for the funding from MARS Inc. This study was conducted in the framework of the joint University of Cambridge-MARS-CIRAD PhD research project ‘Optimising nutrient dynamic to increase yield and sustainability in traditional Brazilian cocoa agroforest in a climate change context’. We thank Wildson Farias, José Francisco de Assunção Neto and their agronomy team for their assistance with the field work. We thank the MARS Center for Cocoa Sciences staff for logistic support; we also thank the Instituto Chico Mendes de Conservação da Biodiversidade (ICMBio) for the research permit in Brazil.
